mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k8s_resource (user_name, namespace_name, resource_name, thrift_server_node_port, use_time, use_type, resource_type_id, container_count, start_time, end_time, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userName}, #{namespaceName}, #{resourceName}, #{thriftServerNodePort}, #{useTime}, #{useType}, #{resourceTypeId}, #{containerCount}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM k8s_resource WHERE user_name = #{userName} AND resource_name = #{resourceName} AND isDeleted = 0;
mapper.update: UPDATE k8s_resource set is_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id};
